about_the_game:
A game experience inspired by wrestling, making use of simulated physics, cardboard boxes with unique skills and movements, fight in large arenas based on arenas that have marked wrestling, such as Madison Square Garden, Arena México and Tokyo Dome.

A new wrestling company has been born, offering a unique show around the world, different fighting styles and extremely skilled fighters ready to give it their all in the ring. The Wrestling Cardboard Championship gives all kinds of cardboard boxes the opportunity to show that they are the strongest and that they have the talent to entertain the people.


Experience different game modes for up to 4 players: 1 vs 1, 2 vs 2, 3 vs 1 and All vs All.


5 unique boxes with varied fighting styles, inspired by well-known brands and professional wrestlers. Each Box has its own theme song and its own personality.

Face 1 vs 1 with the AI and put the skills of each box to the test.
detailed_description:
A game experience inspired by wrestling, making use of simulated physics, cardboard boxes with unique skills and movements, fight in large arenas based on arenas that have marked wrestling, such as Madison Square Garden, Arena México and Tokyo Dome.

A new wrestling company has been born, offering a unique show around the world, different fighting styles and extremely skilled fighters ready to give it their all in the ring. The Wrestling Cardboard Championship gives all kinds of cardboard boxes the opportunity to show that they are the strongest and that they have the talent to entertain the people.


Experience different game modes for up to 4 players: 1 vs 1, 2 vs 2, 3 vs 1 and All vs All.


5 unique boxes with varied fighting styles, inspired by well-known brands and professional wrestlers. Each Box has its own theme song and its own personality.

Face 1 vs 1 with the AI and put the skills of each box to the test.

name: Wrestling Cardboard Championship Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bits)
  • Processor: Intel Celeron 1.6 GHz
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD graphics 400
  • Storage: 700 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated or Dedicated
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bits)
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-8750H 2.20 GHz
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1050 VRAM 4GB
  • Storage: 700 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated or Dedicated

short_description: In the WCC, cardboard boxes with unique skills and moves, fight in large arenas based on Madison Square Garden, Arena Mexico and the Tokyo Dome. This is a demo.
supported_languages:
English*, Spanish - Spain, Spanish - Latin America
*languages with full audio support
